attributes.action: Oppose The Creation of An Additional Darwin Day Public Holiday
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Whilst additional public holidays is a good idea. A public holiday in february does not seem a good idea.

I don't see why Darwin is any more deserving of a day than many other historical figures.

Oh, and in the pro-Darwin Day petition they mistakenly named St Patrick's Day as a UK public holiday.
